test.name: Using Python to get a Cat Fact from a free API and then using Ranorex to open Slack and send that fact to the rotary channel

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: {'createdAt': '2018-01-04T01:10:54.673Z', 'deleted': False, 'user': '5a9ac18c7478810ea6c06381', 'used': False, '_id': '591f98703b90f7150a19c132', 'text': 'It may take as long as 2 weeks for a kitten to be able to hear well. Their eyes usually open between 7 and 10 days, but sometimes it happens in as little as 2 days.', '__v': 0, 'type': 'cat', 'source': 'api', 'updatedAt': '2020-01-02T02:02:48.616Z', 'status': {'verified': True, 'sentCount': 1}}

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: It may take as long as 2 weeks for a kitten to be able to hear well. Their eyes usually open between 7 and 10 days, but sometimes it happens in as little as 2 days.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
kw.msg: ${cat fact} = It may take as long as 2 weeks for a kitten to be able to hear well. Their eyes usually open between 7 and 10 days, but sometimes it happens in as little as 2 days.
